mapper.select: SELECT PROXY_ID, PROXY_TYPE, PROXY_IP, PROXY_PORT, PROXY_PATH, VALIDSTATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME FROM PROXY_CONFIG WHERE PROXY_TYPE = #{proxyType} AND VALIDSTATUS = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE PROXY_CONFIG SET PROXY_IP = #{proxyIp}, PROXY_PORT = #{proxyPort}, PROXY_PATH = #{proxyPath}, UPDATE_TIME = DATETIME() WHERE PROXY_TYPE = #{proxyType} AND VALIDSTATUS = 1
